text: (upbeat music)
- Hello, I am Harshal Joglekar.

I'm product manager of Cloud
Migration at John Deere.

I have been with John
Deere India for 17 years.
For 185 years, John Deere is a leader
in developing innovative solutions

to help our customers
become more productive.

We continue to lead the
agriculture industry
through precision farming.

It drives greater sustainability,
efficiency and safety.

We are increasingly using
cloud platforms, like AWS,
to support our mission-critical systems.

Many advanced AWS services
are used in these systems.

AWS IoT is used to collect
data from thousands
of IoT devices and send it to AWS Cloud.

Various systems use this
data for decision making,
Amazon, EMR, KDA.
These are also used for smart analysis.

AWS OpenSearch, that helps
us to manage secure search
and analyze this data.

As of today, more than
100 AWS services are used
for different purposes.

AWS enterprise support and
technical account managers,

they help us keep things
running smoothly in the cloud.

They also assist us in making
our systems work better
and cost lesser.

They do these through
reviews, training sessions,
and workshops.

At the same time, we make
sure our systems are safe.

Temps are like part of
our development team

and work with us regularly
to plan our cloud strategy.
The AWS enterprise support team partners
with our cloud migration team

to help move applications from
our data centers to cloud.

We are excited about
our ongoing partnership.

We are looking forward
to work with AWS teams,

like support, solutions
architects, account managers,
to improve how we work,
and most importantly,

to bring better technology
to our customers.
This will help them to do more with less,

which is the way forward
to support everyone
and feed our growing world.
Thank you.
(upbeat music continues)
